content.prompt: Which of the following is an accurate description of environmental sustainability policies in China?

choices.label: The Chinese government does not respond to citizen complaints about pollution.
Chinese businesses face no environmental restrictions if they can turn a profit.
The Chinese government has stopped certain damaging projects in response to environmental activists.
Chinese businesses are now prohibited from using coal as an energy source.
Chinese environmental activists often use injunctions by Chinese courts to block the expansion of business projects.
